                       boolean editable,
                       java.lang.Boolean shared,
                       boolean changed)

Parameters:
view - Current view.
tab - Associated tab.
editable - Indicates whether or not set the name editable.
shared - Indicates that element is shared.
changed - Indicates if the save action should be present.
